revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xirrus |model=XR-520 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/01/2013 |manuf_country= |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=SK6-XR520 |ic_id=5428A-XR520 |pwr_v=56 |pwr_amp=0.35 |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5020;CN5020-300BG564-CP-G; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160DTTI-70G |fla1_num= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.xirrus.com/Products/Wireless-Arrays/XR-Series/XR-500 Product page XR-500 series] There appears to be a USB flash drive attached to the main board
in the FCC photos, presumably for the main firmware storage. *"2976432401" is silkscreened on one wireless module in the FCC photos. *"2976432501" is silkscreened on the other wireless module. :AR9220 is the (highly) probable chip used for :256MB RAM? The FCC sample label indicates that the internal model for this device is DRAGON-AP-R.
